channel.title: Scripts on My Obsidian Site
channel.description: Recent content in Scripts on My Obsidian Site

item.description: (shots of people doing things ) look around you, each person is coming from an entirely different world, no one of us has ever entered into each others worlds we have been in the same world since the moment we came here, no one has ever left, we we go around pretending we are living in the same world notice your own world

place without rules

welcome to the creative sea where everything you see is an experience a product of Einstein’s theory of relativity everything is an experience relative to it self what happens when we turn that fact into our creative reality then everything becomes a personal experience a perceptive event everything is diluted into the senses the bodily experience coming from many layers coming through our senses, sight, hearing, touch, smell coming through our perception of time, the past, the future, the now and nothingness, each person has been living under the spell of their own creative trance since the moment they were born and since this moment is the only trackable reference we have of where this experience began and since we can see how everything is a perception, we can see the only trackable difference we have is the difference in the times we came from the only thing that is real, is birth and death, everything else is made up from us, the only thing we have no control over, is the time we will die and the time we are born

the process zine is like a joke in that i never know where its going on, but it always has a punch line to give me, a funny way that makes everything it did before make sense

this project as a metaphor for trusting the creative process, I wanted to see what was meant to learn from this process and the project because the creative stream I would use to practise documenting and following this thing i trusted so deeply in, the process, and what happened was a deepening, each layer would open me into a vaster understanding, I began by eliminating any timeline I had on the project, then I had to eliminate the need to share the process, then it opened into many streams and sides I began breaking down the natural process of creation through the stars and creating my own language which taught me I had to find another way of understanding this experience and then I had to loose the need to understand it and wrap my head around it, and now I am playing through multiple streams different games on different layers of experiences in things we call instagram accounts and each one signifies a different layer of my conscious experience

the number we see on the screen becomes a reflection of self

sometimes I think about how people will judge my work based on how many likes are follows I have, when what i’ve found is the less focus I have on likes and follows, the better art gets produced

the time we are give the birthing of the unknown, the understanding we receive from our experience the world that becomes itself along the way, promising us we are a part of something

we have supplanted a plan in place of unknown potential and in the form of a clock, trust in an undercurrent,

we pretend that time is a constant speed, that it is something we have control of, something we can make ours, our time is our identity, our memory, and tracking it is the way we grip hold of this planet as it apparently spins out of control

the process zine is a tricky game I am playing with myself as this world it evolves using my reality as a test subject to see if the truth of my one great knowing will arrive if i use every second as a reason for it to exist, if I can find the memory of why i am here in every moment I am somewhere one layer always on the hunt to discover how to trust myself more how to find another reason that this reality is on my side and believe that it has my best intentions by believing this I am taken on a journey through every twist and turn to bring me at rapid hurdling speed towards a destiny that is mine to give but it wont let down the performance, the act of how to do so, for it is not only paving the way, it is leaving a trail as evidence of creativity using itself to pull itself from darkness of the great pain and incredible power of how to do your destiny.

art is time (close up shots of art in the home shot with camera, feeling is soft and mellow)

close up shots of art, narrated

  • art is a reflection of time,
  • time has a certain quality to it, and indescribable essence
  • it has a way it curves, it has a colour, a story, time has a meaning.
  • art is a reflection, creation is a reflection
  • when we create with time, then our lives become a reflection of our work, our art
  • when we trust in the time that we already have what we need
  • then we do not work outside of time, attempting to achieve something we already are
